attributes.action: Transport fees for sixth form in south wales
attributes.additional_details: A working Newport is what we all want. A striving Newport is what we all need, but realistically that's not what were going to reach. The cost of the transport for sixth form has risen by hundreds of pounds. How does the council expect Newport to grow if the majority of pupils have to drop out because of the costs? Other councils are following and it needs to be sorted. We chose to stay on to receive a better education, why should we suffer? Who and when was it decided that our future should be  jeopardized for the council to save money?
